homeSection.title: Project COSMO
homeSection.description: Science Club of Cracow University of Technology

whoWeAreSection.title: Who we are?
whoWeAreSection.description: We are the group of Polish students from the Cracow University of Technology. Besides studying, we meet and work towards implementation of our joint project - launching a smart nanosatellite into orbit.

ourGoalSection.title: Our goals
ourGoalSection.description: The main goal is to build a satellite and launch it into orbit. Nevertheless, it is important for us that the sent satellite realize useful goals that we are constantly working on.
